content: ❤️hi in this crochet tutorial we are going to crochet pacman and the 4 little ghosts blinky pinky inky and clyde with a magnet step by step ideal for decorating any metallic surface or as a gift they are very cute quick and easy to make español https //youtu be/dwcqbz4wzhi english https //youtu be/enxj30yspo0 you can find the written pattern from the video in pdf complete https //amigurumisatina etsy com/listing/1867142837 materials used cotton yarn you can find it here https //s click aliexpress com/e/_dcg7y33 difficulty level 1/5 beginner available languages english spanish final size 5cm / 1 95 inches tall varies depending on materials used ❤️ if you love amigurumis and want to discover more fun and unique patterns please subscribe to my youtube channel and turn on the notification bell so you don t miss any new videos ❤️ please note this pattern is for personal use only it is prohibited to share distribute or publish this pattern on social networks or any other means ✅ you can sell the finished items don t forget to give credit to amigurumisatina as the designer see you soon
